title: Saving e-mails
content: I thought I had saved an e-mail with an attachment. When I wanted to retrieve the attachment I got a lot of internal information about the e-mail but no attachment. How can that happen? This has not happened before as I always have attachments saved with the message.
creator: leananger90

title: Canon Scanner email issue with Thunderbird
content: I'm hoping some one on here can help me with a Canon email issue, I have 4 win10 systems andd have Thunderbird and al use either Canon Lide 200 or Lide 210 scanners, a few months ago the ability to auto attach scanned documents to emails failed to work any more, since its a problem on all our systems I can only assume its a software update problem ? - 2 systems I can manually attach scanner documents to Thunderbird with MP Navigator EX 2.0 but the other 2 systems it doesnt recognise Thunderbird is even on my computer, I get a message that says there's no email client to attach it to or associated with the program, the Thunderbird program is the main and only email one set up on these. Can anyone help me with this ? Im really stumped
creator: keith72

title: unwanted change to inbox since small upgrade
content: Since a small upgrade yesterday, all my new emails and all my many archived emails now show sender's full 'email' address alongside their name, in the 'from' column. This is unnecessary, bulky and un-asked for. It makes my inbox look like the alphabet vomited in it. How do I remove this?
creator: wilkandreamichelle
